stadium.name: The South Pole Palisade
stadium.description: A crude, fortified playing field built from rough-hewn logs. It's less a stadium and more a stockade against the wilderness. The 'grass' is mostly frozen mud and straw.

stats.pregame_ritual: Smelling their own game-worn socks from the previous match.
Braiding their hair into tight, battle-ready rows.
Listening to the wind for a sign of which way the game will turn.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Wearing a specific, garishly colored pair of undergarments.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Polishing their boots with bacon grease.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.
Turning their helmet around three times before putting it on.
Licking a whetstone.

stadium.name: The Unruly Yard
stadium.description: A field in the center of the city's most rebellious district. The stadium is covered in graffiti, the crowd is hostile, and riots are a common post-game (and mid-game) event.

stats.pregame_ritual: Drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Testing the heft of their weapon with a series of slow, deliberate swings.
Kissing the Trollball on its stitched 'nose'.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Refusing to step on any lines on the field before the whistle blows.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.

preGame:
# üèüÔ∏è TUESDAY NIGHT TROLLBALL: FROSTBITE AND FISTFIGHTS! üèüÔ∏è

Step right up and huddle close to your receivers, folks! This is your favorite demon of the airwaves, **Nok the Corrupter**, coming to you live from the edge of the map! We are bunkered down inside **The South Pole Palisade**, and let me tell you, it is a real ice-box out here! The wind is howling like a pack of starving wolves‚Äîmostly because there is a pack of starving wolves howling right outside the log walls! Ha ha! Tonight is the final week of the season, and the stakes are higher than High Prince Duke Bar≈ën‚Äôs wig! ‚ùÑÔ∏èü¶¥

Tonight, we‚Äôve got a real doozy for you. The **South Pole Yetis** are defending their home turf of frozen mud and straw against the visiting **New Monteforte Chaos Creatures**! Now, the Chaos Creatures might be associated with that dirt-wizard Dame Terra Monteforte, but don‚Äôt let their lack of fans fool you‚Äîthese folks are ready to rumble! I saw **Lian Denton** earlier drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup! That‚Äôs the kind of pre-game fuel that leads to broken ribs, and you know I love to see it! üçµüí•

On the other side of the field, the Yetis are looking chilly but lethal. **Udela Dorkus** was spotted licking a whetstone to sharpen her appetite for destruction, while **Seiter Aida** was getting a good whiff of some game-worn socks. It‚Äôs that kind of rustic charm that really brings the fans out‚Äîwell, the few fans who weren't eaten by the local wildlife on the way here! It‚Äôs a shame my **Ebon Gate Corruptors** aren't out here to show them how it's really done, and thank the Abyss the **Haven Lights** aren't here to bore us with their 'virtue'! Let‚Äôs get to the action! ‚ùÑÔ∏èüèîÔ∏è
postGame:
# üèÜ POST-GAME WRAP-UP: A CHILLING VICTORY! üèÜ

## üßä Final Score: South Pole Yetis 1 - Chaos Creatures 0 üßä

Holy smokes, what a game! If you like your sports cold, muddy, and full of medical emergencies, tonight was your Christmas, Hanukkah, and Solstice all rolled into one! The South Pole Yetis have defended their stockade in a game that was as tight as Sir Tanos's armor after a week of feasting! üçóüõ°Ô∏è

Things started off with a frantic scramble in the center field! **Ajit Serge** scooped up that troll head like it was the last scrap of meat in a famine. The Chaos Creatures tried to put the squeeze on early, with **Mouldon Earl** showing some impressive blocking skills against Udela Dorkus. It was a real tug-of-war in the mud, folks, and the violence was just getting warmed up! I love to see that troll head bouncing around like a decapitated dream! üí•

We saw our first trip to the infirmary when **Fogel Raynold** absolutely leveled **Selima Si**! A beautiful tackle that sent Selima straight to the sidelines with a glorious injury. That‚Äôs what we call a 'South Pole Stinger'! Honestly, Fogel was hitting so hard I thought he might be trying to dig a hole straight back to the Demon Prison! ü§ï

The Chaos Creatures had their chances, believe you me! **Raouf Dragone** was charging toward the goal like a bat out of hell, but the Yetis' defense held firm. **Sale Tocci** had a bit of a butter-fingers moment, dropping a pass to Coussoule Bidle that could have changed the whole complexion of the first half. It was enough to make a demon weep with joy at the incompetence! üêâ‚ùå

Just before the half-time whistle, the Yetis started playing dirty! **Sale Tocci** redeemed herself by injuring **Alben Diantha**, and then **Udela Dorkus** decided to send **Mouldon Earl** to the healer with a bone-crunching tackle! The Chaos Creatures were looking more like 'Chaos Crumbs' at that point! It's a wonder Dame Terra Monteforte didn't try to pull a prophet out of her hat to save them! üçûü¶¥

After the break‚Äîwhere I assume everyone just huddled for warmth and prayed to whatever gods haven't abandoned Osterra‚Äîthe blood started flowing again. **Raouf Dragone** came back with a vengeance, taking out **Sale Tocci**! It was a regular revolving door at the healer‚Äôs tent! **Seiter Aida** was working overtime, probably using those smelly socks to wake the unconscious players! ‚õ∫ü©π

**Fogel Raynold** was a one-man wrecking crew tonight, folks! He sent **Isborne Krause** to the dirt with another injury. Honestly, if Fogel played for my **Ebon Gate Corruptors**, we‚Äôd have the league trophy by now! He was hitting harder than a hangover after an open bar‚Äîtoo bad there was no booze tonight to numb the pain of those hits! üî®üí•

We had some missed opportunities that would make a ghost blush! Both **Udela Dorkus** and **Raouf Dragone** tried to play the big hero with long-distance shots from center field, but they both missed the basket! It‚Äôs harder to aim when your fingers are turning blue and the wind is whistling through your helmet, isn‚Äôt it? Maybe they should ask Cinnemon for a book on how to aim! üå¨Ô∏èüèÄ

As the clock ticked down, the tension was higher than the blood pressure of a tax collector! **Gabriele Klehm** managed to take out **Udela Dorkus** with a nasty tackle, but it was too little, too late for the New Monteforte squad. They just couldn't find the rhythm, probably because they were too busy listening to **Wolbrom Ariella** sing sea shanties out of tune! üé∂‚öì

Then came the play of the game! **Duky Orelee** grabbed the ball, dodged a few desperate swings, and charged into the End Zone like a man possessed! He **DUNKED** that troll head right into the basket! The crowd‚Äîmostly just a few frostbitten locals and some very confused White Ravens‚Äîwent wild! Or at least, they stomped their boots loudly enough to cause an avalanche! üèÄüî•

It was a tough night for the Chaos Creatures, who go home with nothing but bruises. I bet Imra and Elspeth are already brewing up something to soothe those Yeti muscles, but for the Chaos Creatures, it's a long, cold walk back to New Monteforte. They played like they were stuck in the mud, which, considering the field, they actually were! üßäüö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

And that‚Äôs all she wrote, folks! A 1-0 victory for the **South Pole Yetis**! They head into the playoffs with momentum, while the Chaos Creatures head home to lick their wounds. This is **Nok the Corrupter**, signing off and heading to the nearest fire! Keep the violence high and the mercy low, Osterra! üèÅüëπ
